text: So if your examples isn't too simple, it might be nice to get a hold of that example so I can present it as a challenge to some of the others in the Julia Lab. I have been wanting to really tackle this one head on for awhile.

text: I am currently busy with finishing one part of my research project, but I am happy to implement a prototype afterwards. However, this may take some weeks.
